summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6087 for the improvement of Mayflower Street from 54th Avenue South to Wilson Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving with portland cement concrete and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83951 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
